entries.em-settings-NoRespecCost-desc: There will be no cost to reset skill points. The value in the multiplier below will be ignored.
entries.em-settings-multiplier-RespecCost-desc: The experience gained will be multiplied by the value of this field.
entries.em-settings-useFlexXP-desc: The experience gained for the level and all player skills will share the same multiplier.
entries.em-settings-multiplier-Flex-desc: The experience gained will be multiplied by the value of this field.
entries.em-settings-multiplier-Level-desc: The experience gained will be multiplied by the value of this field.
